article.title: TeleCommunication Systems Wins U.S. Marine Corps Contract for Network Systems and Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: TeleCommunication Systems Incorporated (TCS) has received a $3.3 million contract to support the U.S. Marine Corps for its wireless point-to-point link network solution. TCS will deliver systems for use by the Marine Corps in support of operation Enduring Freedom and operation Iraqi Freedom.
